import React,{useState} from 'react'; import CheckOutSteps from '../components/checkOutSteps'; import {useDispatch} from 'react-redux'; import savePaymentMethod from '../actions/cartActions' export default function PaymentMethodScreen(props) { const [paymentMethod,setPaymentMethod]=useState('PayPal'); const dispatch=useDispatch(); const submitHandler=(e)=> { e.preventDefault(); dispatch(savePaymentMethod(paymentMethod)); props.history.push('/placeorder'); } return(

Payment

setPaymentMethod(e.target.value)}>

) }
